She says: it is never black or white.Even in case of sustainability.’ Today the world is trying to stand against plastic for example,However, it forgets to tell people how plastic is made. Plastic is a by-product of the fractionalisation process and can be recycled n number of times if right process is followed.Hence, you’re saying no to plastic will not help as much as you disposing of plastic at the right place and using recycled plastic products. However, the world is a progressive place and mor and more technologies will keep on getting innovated for a better and better solution to protect the environment. However, it should not stop us from accepting a percentage of sustainable behaviour as compared to absolutely sustainability.
